document.discussion_title: Lighthouse restored to its former glory
document.topic_text: Home News Sport Announcements Jobs Most popular UK news Send us your news Cars Traffic & travel Business Directory Property Dating Desktop site Lighthouse restored to its former glory From left to right: Cllr Derek Bastiman, leader of Scarborough Borough Council; Cllr Mike Cockerill, cabinet member for harbours and assets; Oliver Counsell, project manager for Lanstone Conservation John Woodhead, project manager for Scarborough Borough
